pkgmetadata.longdescription: Joint Segmentation of Multivariate (Copy Number) Signals // Methods for fast segmentation of multivariate signals into piecewise constant profiles and for generating realistic copy- number profiles. A typical application is the joint segmentation of total DNA copy numbers and allelic ratios obtained from Single Nucleotide Polymorphism (SNP) microarrays in cancer studies. The methods are described in Pierre-Jean, Rigaill and Neuvial (2015) doi:10.1093/bib/bbu026.
